mixed-citation.article-title: Four new species and new records of Platygastrinae (Hymenoptera: Platygastridae) from Iran

tp:treatment-sec.p: Holarctic region ( Jordan /United Arab Emirate) ( Buhl 2015 ); Iran ( Fars Province , Khonj) ( Buhl 2015 ).

One male specimen of P. harteni was obtained from Stefaniola similata Mamaev, 1972 ( Diptera : Cecidomyiidae ) on Haloxylon ammodendron , South Khorasan Province , 50 km of Birjand, Mud; S. similata represents a new host for P. harteni .
Stefaniola similata Mamaev, 1972 ( Diptera : Cecidomyiidae ) on H. ammodendron is a new host record for Platygaster harteni .
